creditline: Gift of Michael and Rosalyn Baker
description: yellow woman adorned with purple lines; she is kneeling and holding pink and blue globe in PL hand
inscription:
Printed text on poster reads: [JOINT SHOW A MOMENTS GRACE FOR ALL THOSE WHO LIVE ON THE RAZORS EDGE & A NEW SPECTRE FOR THOSE ALIVE ON THE SHORES OF THE PACIFIC SEE WES WILSON VICTOR MOSCOSO STANLEY MOUSE ALTON KELLY (sic) AND RICK GRIFFIN IN THE FLESH ALSO COUNTRY JOE AND THE FISH MOORE GALLERIES SAN FRANCISCO CAL USA]

LL: [c 1967 wes wilson - first edition - joint show - moore gallery - san francisco]
LR: [lithographers - neal, stratford & kerr]
provenance: Michael and Rosalyn Baker, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
title: Joint Show. The Moore Galleries
